column4: can anyone help me get firestarter to autostart after reboot, i'm using ubuntu 8.04?
you don't actually need firestarter running for the firewall to run, but in case you want to, just add "firestarter" command to your autostart section
as i said to AaronH , yes i have that and even changed sudoers file to allow it without password but not working...
& AaronH, i see that ubuntu has changed many things from debian standard ;(
